Source: vignettes/BiocChallenges.Rmd
BiocChallenges.Rmd

Abstract

Challenges for the Biocoductor community.

Welcome

The goal of BiocChallenges is to host challenges contributed by and for the Bioconductor community.

Challenge difficulty

Each challenge is accompanied by an estimated difficulty. The difficulty level can be one of:

  • Novice
  • Intermediate
  • Advanced

Topics

Each challenge is tagged by a list of topic labels to facilitate categorization and discoverability. Topic tags can be any combination of:

  • Challenges
  • Community
  • Single-cell
  • Visualization

New topics can be submitted as pull requests editing the topics.R script.

Contents

Developed by Kevin Rue-Albrecht.
